import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, Button, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap"; const Pizza = ({pizza}) => { const [varient,setVariant] = useState('small'); const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(1); return ( <> {pizza.name}
Varients
Quantity
 Price : {pizza.price[0][varients] * quantity} ) } export default Pizza
